title: Flikcart   Technical Architect( IOT)
content:
Education: B.Tech - Tier 2 College
Years of Experience: 9+
Prior Experience: One of the top MNCs
Previous TC : 64,00,000
Date of the Offer: 13th December 2023
Company: Bosch
Title/Level: Technical Architect( IOT)
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 90,00,000
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 0
ESOPs: 28,00,000 (divided over 4 years)
Bonus: 5,00,000
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 1CR +

Other details: Negotiated twice.
